attributes.action: Reduce the cost of early morning mid week rail travel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having attempted to travel to London from South Wales 5 Feb. (morning of snow)to avoid bad road conditions, I was confronted with a cost of £199.98 for a day return. Once again the British public are taken for a ride with rediculous prices for rail travel.
Please sign petition if you feel rail travel prices are exorbitant.
